entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:46 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
